remarks: If a set of reals contains a lower bound, it contains a unique lower bound that belongs to the set.  (Contributed by NM, 9-Oct-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Dec-2016.)
statement:
lbcl $p |- ( ( S C_ RR /\ E. x e. S A. y e. S x <_ y ) -> ( iota_ x e. S A. y e. S x <_ y ) e. S ) $.
$d S x y $.
